songs.title: Lucifer's Slaves
songs.lyrics:
We are Lucifer's Slaves
Born dead we'll never be saved
When we're high we are free
Our blood weed & LSD
Cos...Losers got nothing to lose
We are sick of your abuse
The Chosen Few and The Living Dead
We're all Lucifer's Slaves in the end
Dead souls reborn to kill
Now undead we cannot feel
We are the Antichrists
We are the New Reich
F*ck your world, f*ck everything...
Lucifer's Slaves
Beyond being saved
You can't beat the dead...
Die...DIE...F*ck YOU!........
